name: CANEPHRON (TM)
treatmentDescriptions: Canephron is a traditional herbal medicinal product for supportive treatment and as an adjuvant to specific measures in cases of mild complaints (such as frequent urination, burning micturition, and the increased urge to urinate) caused by inflammatory diseases of the efferent urinary tract, in adults and children from the age of 12 years.The product is a traditional herbal medicinal product for use in specified indications exclusively based upon long-standing use
ingredients: ROSEMARY LEAF, LOVAGE ROOT, CENTAURIUM ERYTHRAEA
